snippet: Jia Perkins scored 24 points and Becky Hammon had 23 as the San Antonio Silver Stars beat the Liberty, 94-81, in Newark for their seventh straight victory.
abstract: San Antonio Silver Stars defeat New York Liberty, 94-81, marking San Antonio's seventh straight victory.
lead_paragraph: Jia Perkins scored 24 points and Becky Hammon had 23 as the San Antonio Silver Stars beat the Liberty, 94-81, in Newark for their seventh straight victory.

headline.seo: Liberty Lose at Home to Silver Stars
headline.main: Liberty Lose at Home to Silver Stars
